column4: hey guys, sometimes when i run my ruby/gosu game that plays .ogg music...it says 'error something run-time device, something slave, can't play music' or something along those lines. almost like it can't play music in two places at once...i.e from a program on my desktop AND in the game. if i close the program on my desktop (usually something like firefox) the music usually runs fine in my game. what's going on ?
sorry the exact error is 'error initializing output device'
your using OSS try switching to ALSA instead
use ALSA as your default sound rendering device.
